titles.title: Save Our Small and Seasonal Businesses Act of 2011
To extend the termination date for the exemption of returning workers from the numerical limitations for temporary workers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration Policy and Enforcement.

bill.summary: 12/15/2011--Introduced. Save Our Small and Seasonal Businesses Act of 2011 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to exempt certain returning H-2B aliens (temporary nonagricultural workers) from annual numerical limitations.
